text: Debia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is found from the Indian subcontinent to south-central China and the Philippines. ==Species== *Debia andamanica *Debia krewanhensis *Debia oligocephala *Debia ovatifolia ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Spermacoceae Category:Flora of the Philippines Category:Flora of China
title: Debia
